import firebase from"firebase/app";import"firebase/database";import"firebase/auth";var logIn=function logIn(user){return function(dispatch,getState,_ref){var getFirebase=_ref.getFirebase;var firebase=getFirebase();firebase.auth().signInWithEmailAndPassword(user.inputEmail,user.inputPassword).then(function(){return dispatch({type:"LOGIN_SUCCESS"});}).catch(function(error){return dispatch({type:"LOGIN_ERROR",error:error});});};};var logOut=function logOut(){return function(dispatch,getState,_ref2){var getFirebase=_ref2.getFirebase;var firebase=getFirebase();firebase.auth().signOut().then(function(){dispatch({type:"LOGOUT_SUCCESS"});}).catch(function(error){dispatch({type:"LOGOUT_ERROR"},error);});};};var register=function register(user){return function(dispatch,getState,_ref3){var getFirebase=_ref3.getFirebase;var db=firebase.database();var firebase1=getFirebase();firebase1.auth().createUserWithEmailAndPassword(user.inputEmail,user.inputPassword).then(function(cred){dispatch({type:"REGISTER_SUCCESS"});db.ref("users/".concat(cred.user.uid)).set({name:user.displayName,lastname:user.displayLastName});console.log("user.uid:",cred.user.uid);// I added user
}).catch(function(error){return dispatch({type:"REGISTER_ERROR",error:error});});};};export var authActions={logIn:logIn,logOut:logOut,register:register};
